title: Star

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: The upper text explains the mechanic.

desc:
Post 2395
- __Tag: Mario Kart__: This card cannot be played and has its passives disabled unless if this is the most recent-drawn __Mario Kart__ item card.
- This card is **Ethereal**.

- Playing this card puts you into a power position, making you **Slick** for 2 turns. For every player you change into a tie / surpass / go behind in terms of cards in hand while slick, they draw 1 card and lose 3 ðŸ’µ. This effect can be activated on others' turns.
 - You are immune to Blue Shell (223) while you are **Slick** from this card.
